sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.2%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 6.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.1%.
Home Depot is lower by about 5.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 1.8%, and Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading up 1.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
